verse: अथ यदि भ्रातृलोककामो भवति संकल्पादेवास्य भ्रातरः समुत्तिष्ठन्ति तेन भ्रातृलोकेन संपन्नो महीयते॥

terms.संकल्पादेवास्य (sankalpadevasya): from a resolve in his mind
terms.भ्रातृलोकेन (bhratrulokena): by the world of the brothers

meaning: Meaning:Now, if a desire for the brother's world arises from a resolve in his mind, the brothers rise up by it and the one possessed of the world of the brothers is esteemed or glorified.
